data.name: BOQ Platinum Visa Credit Card
data.description:
Enjoy Q Rewards points for every dollar you spend on Eligible Transactions , plus get access to complimentary international travel insurance and extended warranties (terms, conditions, limits and exclusions apply). Awarded Canstar's 5-Star Rating for Outstanding Value Premium Credit Card
Our BOQ Platinum Visa Credit Card is literally an award winning card
We're proud to announce in April 2019, we were awarded the 5-Star Rating for Outstanding Value Premium Credit Card, in the $120k spend category
The BOQ Visa Platinum Credit Card is a winning card for those who appreciate value while still being rewarded

eligibility.additionalInfo: Be at least 18 years of age
Earn a taxable income of $35,000 per year or more
Be a permanent Australian resident or citizen

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Except to the extent that an interest free period applies, you must pay interest on everything charged to your account. Interest is charged monthly at the end of each statement period. We calculate interest for each balance type at its applicable APR for each statement period. The APR (Annual Percentage Rate) that applies to each balance type (e.g. a balance transfer) also applies to related fees and interest. The Retail APR applies to retail purchase balance. To calculate that interest, we multiply the applicable daily percentage rate by the daily unpaid balance of its balance type (including related fees and interest) for each day of that statement period, and then add those amounts together. The daily percentage rate is the applicable APR divided by 365. Information on any APR is available on request.

Except to the extent that an interest free period applies, you must pay interest on everything charged to your account. Interest is charged monthly at the end of each statement period. We calculate interest for each balance type at its applicable APR for each statement period. The APR (Annual Percentage Rate) that applies to each balance type (e.g. a balance transfer) also applies to related fees and interest. The Retail APR applies to retail purchase balance. To calculate that interest, we multiply the applicable daily percentage rate by the daily unpaid balance of its balance type (including related fees and interest) for each day of that statement period, and then add those amounts together. The daily percentage rate is the applicable APR divided by 365. Information on any APR is available on request.

features.additionalInfo: Add up to 4 Additional Cardholders with no annual fee
Earn 2 Q Rewards®  credit card points for every $1 spent on Eligible Transactions
Complimentary travel insurance for you and your family (terms, conditions, limits and exclusions apply)
When you purchase items with your Platinum Visa Card. Terms, conditions and exclusions apply

If covered products are lost, stolen or damaged anywhere in the world within 90 days of purchase on your Platinum Visa Credit Card, they may be repaired, replaced, rebuilt or reinstated, free of charge if you make a claim within 21 days of the incident. Terms, conditions and exclusions apply.

Guaranteed Pricing Scheme enables you to receive a refund of the price difference when you purchase in-store and then see the same product advertised at a lower price in a catalogue from a store within 25 kms of the store from where the covered products were purchased, you can claim the difference within 60 days if the price difference is greater than $75, up to $500 and the product hasn't been purchased online. Terms, conditions and exclusions apply
Priority 24/7 customer service for your card enquiries
Your personal 24 hour concierge service - we'll help you shop, find the perfect gift or book your next holiday
$1,000 daily cash advance limit through ATMs

features.additionalValue: 0% p.a. for 14 months balance transfer offer
features.additionalInfo: For the first 14 months, reverting to the cash advance rate thereafter. No interest free days apply to retail purchases while you have a balance transfer
Up to 55 days interest free for your purchases (Interest Free Days are not available if you have a Balance Transfer)
